title: Stocks Climb as Options Expiry Approaches $7.1 Trillion | The Close 12/19/2025
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are Robinhood Markets’ Stephanie Guild, CHANGE Global’s Thea Jamison, D Cowen’s Tom Fitzgerald, Navan’s Amy Butte, DWS Group’s David Bianco, Teneo’s Paul Keary, Counter’s Gregg Renfrew. (Source: Bloomberg)
